text:
I am experiencing the exact issue described here and reported as fixed in 2.0.36:

http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=8234

Windows XP Pro SP1
PHP 4.3.10
Apache 2.052

Apache installed with MSI/EXE installed.  PHP running as CGI Binary.

worksforme. You might want to give some more specific information like
configuration, what is the request, what is in the error log and so.
